model.interfaces.components.entities

Interface Atom

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAtom

    public interface Atom
    An atom is an immutable sequence of bytes uniquely identified by a GUID. The GUID is deterministically derived from the atom's sequence of bytes. Atoms are uniquely identifiable within the Sea of Stuff.

    Intuition:
    A GUID is a shorthand for a sequence of bytes. GUIDs and the sequences of bytes that they represent are in 1:1 correspondence and once created are good for all time.

    Author:
    Simone I. Conte "sic2@st-andrews.ac.uk"
    See Also:
    GUID
